title: Islamic Jigsaw Puzzles for Kids and Adults 3 Pack, 63 Piece Puzzle Educational Games, Cardboard Kaaba Puzzles Gift Set for Children Kids Boys Girls with 3 Posters, Gifts for Eid Ramadan Birthday
features: ✅ 3 Puzzles And 3 Posters: These jigsaw puzzles for adults and kids feature vibrant, Islamic Mosque-inspired designs including the Kaaba and Makkah to keep your little one engaged. Each kids puzzle set comes with a completed poster for easy reference and guidance

✅ Encourage Creative Play: Each jigsaw puzzle comes with 63 pieces to provide an even balance of fun and challenge to provide an enjoyable time for both kids and adults. Designed to inspire imagination and creativity, our kids jigsaw puzzles also help strengthen ties to faith and culture

✅ Quality Cardboard Build: We made our Islamic Jigsaw Puzzles for adults and kids using strong cardboard with a sleek finish to make sure they are durable enough for day to day play. Each puzzle piece features a colour-coded back for easy sorting and comes in an elegantly designed box for convenient storage

✅ Fun For Everyone: This jigsaw kids puzzle set is the ideal choice for families to have fun together and develop a closer relationship while fostering problem-solving, observation, concentration, and matching skills making them ideal for family game nights

✅ Educational Gift For Kids: Our Islamic educational puzzle games make the perfect Ramadan gift and Eid gifts for kids! They also make thoughtful gifts for boys and girls on any occasion or holiday throughout the year to promote creative play the fun way
description: Product Description Designed For Puzzle Lovers Looking for a perfect special gift? These puzzles are packed in long-lasting beautifully designed box that are ready to be given as a Birthday, Eid, Ramadan or Special Surprise gift. Sharpen The Brain & Improve Teamwork These puzzles represent the three holiest sites in Islam, offering a thoughtful way to encourage discussions about Islamic history, Cultural Significance, and the Beauty of these Sacred Mosques. High-Quality, Strong & Bend Resistant Cardboard 2mm Thick & 5.3 cm width Each piece is made of strong chipboard with a shiny finish, ensuring longevity and a smooth assembly experience. Each puzzle-chip include coloured backs on the pieces to distinguish between multiple puzzle designs in one box. Educational puzzles. Strengthen Faith Culture & Problem Solving Skills Fun Way To Connect With Family & Friends They also allow for meaningful family togetherness and the growth of the self. They create a space for quality family time and personal enrichment, all while connecting with Islamic heritage.
